title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - December 9, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - December 9, 2021
description:
Mark joins Gary from the Geragos & Geragos NYC Christmas party for some live reaction to the verdict coming down in Jussie Smollett's case.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
